Name: Season of 12 Colors
About the game: --The way it was, Just like it is now, On a bright, bright summer day. 'That's a promise, right?' The girl in a white dress said. Sunny sky. A paper plane slid across it, riding on blue winds. ============================================== 'Season of 12 colors' is a Healing Visual Novel Series: four independent short stories around the same theme. 'Summer:Message on the Paper Plane' is the first chapter released. The other three chapters will be released later as DLC. 'Paper Plane' is a partly nonlinear story about childhood memories. Collecting all pieces from different point-of-view, then the truth will emerge. This is our second project, if you are interested in our previous work, please visit Gaokao.Love.100Days .
